code: export var getCharacter=function getCharacter(file){return String.fromCharCode(file+96);};export var createPosition=function createPosition(){var position=new Array(8).fill("").map(function(x){return new Array(8).fill("");});for(var i=0;i<8;i++){position[6][i]="bp";position[1][i]="wp";}position[0][0]="wr";position[0][1]="wn";position[0][2]="wb";position[0][3]="wq";position[0][4]="wk";position[0][5]="wb";position[0][6]="wn";position[0][7]="wr";position[7][0]="br";position[7][1]="bn";position[7][2]="bb";position[7][3]="bq";position[7][4]="bk";position[7][5]="bb";position[7][6]="bn";position[7][7]="br";return position;};export var copyPosition=function copyPosition(position){var newPosition=new Array(8).fill("").map(function(x){return new Array(8).fill("");});for(var rank=0;rank<position.length;rank++){for(var file=0;file<position[0].length;file++){newPosition[rank][file]=position[rank][file];}}return newPosition;};export var areSameColorTiles=function areSameColorTiles(coords1,coords2){return(coords1.x+coords1.y)%2===coords2.x+coords2.y;};export var findPieceCoords=function findPieceCoords(position,type){var results=[];position.forEach(function(rank,i){rank.forEach(function(pos,j){if(pos===type)results.push({x:i,y:j});});});return results;};export var getNewMoveNotation=function getNewMoveNotation(_ref){var piece=_ref.piece,rank=_ref.rank,file=_ref.file,x=_ref.x,y=_ref.y,position=_ref.position,promotesTo=_ref.promotesTo;var note="";rank=Number(rank);file=Number(file);if(piece[1]==="k"&&Math.abs(file-y)===2){if(file<y)return"O-O";else return"O-O-O";}if(piece[1]!=="p"){note+=piece[1].toUpperCase();if(position[x][y]){note+="x";}}else if(rank!==x&&file!==y){note+=getCharacter(file+1)+"x";}note+=getCharacter(y+1)+(x+1);if(promotesTo)note+="="+promotesTo.toUpperCase();return note;};
